name: Dice&Dragons
description:
A downloadable game

Get ready to ROLL! You are roleplaying as THE TOUGHEST GUY on his quest to defeat the DARK FORCES and save the universe! You may find yourself in a dicey situation when you enter the world of a young tabletop player. Your characters are the dice on the table. Roll, shoot, and jump your way through a fantasy world. Fight creatures and try not to die. Your rolls change your abilities, so move carefully!

This game was made by a French and American team for the 48-hour GMTK GameJam. The theme was “roll the dice.” We hope you enjoy!
